claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Ku Klux Klan  (  KKK  )  , or simply the Klan , is the name of three distinct movements in the United States that have advocated extremist reactionary currents such as white supremacy , white nationalism , anti-immigration , and , especially in later iterations , Nordicism , anti-Catholicism , and antisemitism .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Historically the KKK used terrorism , both physical assault and murder , against groups or individuals whom they opposed .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: All three movements have called for the `` purification '' of American society , and all are considered right-wing extremist organizations .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The first Klan flourished in the Southern United States in the late 1860s , then died out by the early 1870s .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It sought to overthrow the Republican state governments in the South during the Reconstruction Era , especially by using violence against African American leaders .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: With numerous chapters across the South , it was suppressed around 1871 , through federal law enforcement .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Members made their own , often colorful , costumes : robes , masks , and conical hats , designed to be terrifying , and to hide their identities .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The second group was founded in 1915 , and it flourished nationwide in the early and mid-1920s , particularly in urban areas of the Midwest and West .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It was rooted in local Protestant communities and opposed Catholics and Jews , and stressed its opposition to the Catholic Church at a time of high immigration from mostly Catholic nations of southern and eastern Europe .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This second organization adopted a standard white costume and used code words which were similar to those used by the first Klan , while adding cross burnings and mass parades to intimidate others .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The third and current manifestation of the KKK emerged after 1950 , in the form of small , local , unconnected groups that use the KKK name .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: They have focused on opposition to the Civil Rights Movement , often using violence and murder to suppress activists .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It is classified as a hate group by the Anti-Defamation League and the Southern Poverty Law Center .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: , the Anti-Defamation League puts total Klan membership nationwide at around 3,000 , while the Southern Poverty Law Center  (  SPLC  )  puts it at 6,000 members total .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The second and third incarnations of the Ku Klux Klan made frequent references to America 's `` Anglo-Saxon '' blood , hearkening back to 19th-century nativism .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Although members of the KKK swear to uphold Christian morality , virtually every Christian denomination has officially denounced the KKK .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Unlike the Protestant second Ku Klux Klan  (  1915 -- 1944  )  , the group unites white-supremacist Christians of different denominations .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Guardians was published when White was 81 years old , three years before her death , and one year before the second Ku Klux Klan declared bankruptcy .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The National Knights were founded by James Venable , a second generation Klansmen whose family owned the property on Stone Mountain where the Second Era Ku Klux Klan was founded .

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The second iteration of the Ku Klux Klan emerged in the 1930s and was officially branded as `` the Knights of the Ku Klux Klan . ''

claim: The second Ku Klux Klan died out by the 1870s.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ku Klux Klan auxiliaries are organized groups that supplement , but do not directly integrate with the Ku Klux Klan .
